⚠️ Microphone access requires HTTPS. Please use the HTTPS version of this site or run locally.

Note: Voice features are disabled. You can still use text chat.

⚠️ Unable to access microphone. Please use HTTPS (run 'npm run dev:https') or check browser permissions.

Text chat is still available.
